content.content: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before using our health, fitness, and productivity content website.
By accessing or using our health and productivity content, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, then you may not access our content or services.

Our content is for informational and educational purposes only. It is not intended as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare providers before starting any fitness program or making significant dietary changes.
You may use our health and productivity content only for personal, non-commercial purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to:

items: Redistribute our workout plans, meal guides, or content without permission
Use our content for commercial fitness or nutrition businesses
Modify our content and present it as your own
Share our premium resources outside of your personal use
Use our content in any way that could harm others' health or safety

content.content: Our workout plans, meal guides, productivity templates, and original content are and will remain the exclusive property of TopPicksOnline and its content creators.

By using our fitness content, you acknowledge that physical exercise carries inherent risks. You participate in any suggested activities at your own risk and are responsible for your safety and well-being.

In no event shall TopPicksOnline, its founder, or content contributors be liable for any injury, health issue, or other damages arising from the use of our fitness, nutrition, or productivity content.
If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at yarraelliz@topicksonline.com
